content.question: Which of the following led most directly to the development of the trading network on the map?

choices.label: The growth of trading cities on the Swahili Coast
Innovations in transportation and commercial technologies such as caravanserai
The overall decline in the trade of goods along the Silk Roads
The emergence of the trans-Atlantic slave trade in West Africa

content.answer: Innovations in transportation and commercial technologies such as caravanserai

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
